alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 26 at 2:18AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson, northwestern Gulf, southeastern Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, west central Gadsden and northwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 300 AM EDT/200 AM CDT/... At 218 AM EDT/118 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Blountstown to 8 miles west of Tyndall Air Force Base. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Callaway, Blountstown, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Wewahitchka, Bristol, Altha, Rock Bluff, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Selman, Abe Springs, Allanton and Dirego Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty
